short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The candidates are hiding on Linkedin and Xing. Can you seek them with this Chrome extension?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser plugin that will let you keep your candidate profiles up to date inside your CRM with a couple of clicks
